057/**
058 *  Helper methods for the new taglet implementations.
059 *
060 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
061 *  @version $Id: Common.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
062 *  @since 0.0.5
063 */
064@SuppressWarnings( "ClassWithTooManyFields" )
065@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Common.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
066@API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5")
067@UtilityClass
068public final class Common
069{
070        /*------------*\
071    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
072        \*------------*/
073    /**
074     *  The taglet collection.
075     */
076    private static List<Taglet> m_InlineTagletCollection;
077
078    /**
079     *  The guard for the taglet collection.
080     */
081    private static final Object m_InlineTagletCollectionGuard = new Object();
082

171    /**
172     *  The lead-in sequence for a tag.
173     */
174    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5")
175    public static final String TAG_LEADIN;
176
177    /**
178     * Location to search for taglets.
179     */
180    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5")
181    public static final JavaFileManager.Location TAGLET_PATH;

183    /**
184     *  Location to search for upgradeable system modules.
185     */
186    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5")
187    public static final JavaFileManager.Location UPGRADE_MODULE_PATH;
188
189    static
190    {
191        TAG_LEADIN = "{@";
192
193        //---* Initialise the locations *--------------------------------------
194        ANNOTATION_PROCESSOR_MODULE_PATH = StandardLocation.ANNOTATION_PROCESSOR_MODULE_PATH;
195        ANNOTATION_PROCESSOR_PATH = StandardLocation.ANNOTATION_PROCESSOR_PATH;
196        CLASS_OUTPUT = StandardLocation.CLASS_OUTPUT;
197        CLASS_PATH = StandardLocation.CLASS_PATH;
198        DOCLET_PATH = DocumentationTool.Location.DOCLET_PATH;
199        DOCUMENTATION_OUTPUT = DocumentationTool.Location.DOCUMENTATION_OUTPUT;
200        MODULE_PATH = StandardLocation.MODULE_PATH;
201        MODULE_SOURCE_PATH = StandardLocation.MODULE_SOURCE_PATH;
202        NATIVE_HEADER_OUTPUT = StandardLocation.NATIVE_HEADER_OUTPUT;
203        PATCH_MODULE_PATH = StandardLocation.PLATFORM_CLASS_PATH;
204        PLATFORM_CLASS_PATH = StandardLocation.PLATFORM_CLASS_PATH;
205        SOURCE_OUTPUT = StandardLocation.SOURCE_OUTPUT;
206        SOURCE_PATH = StandardLocation.SOURCE_PATH;
207        SYSTEM_MODULES = StandardLocation.SYSTEM_MODULES;
208        TAGLET_PATH = DocumentationTool.Location.TAGLET_PATH;
209        UPGRADE_MODULE_PATH = StandardLocation.UPGRADE_MODULE_PATH;
210    }

212        /*--------------*\
213    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
214        \*--------------*/
215    /**
216     *  No instance allowed for this class.
217     */
218    private Common() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( Common.class ); }
219
220        /*---------*\
221    ====** Methods **==========================================================
222        \*---------*/
223    /**
224     *  Creates the format String for a line number, based on the highest
225     *  possible value.
226     *
227     *  @param  maxValue    The highest possible value.
228     *  @return The format String.
229     */
230    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5" )
231    public static final String createLineNumberFormatString( final int maxValue )
232    {
233        if( maxValue < 0 ) throw new ValidationException( format( "Invalid value: %d", maxValue ) );
234        final var retValue = format( "<span class=\"source-line-no\">%%0%dd</span>", round( floor( log10( maxValue ) + 1.0 ) ) );
235
236        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
237        return retValue;
238    }   //  createLineNumberFormatString()
239
240    /**
241     *  Determines the name of an element for output.
242     *
243     *  @param  element The element.
244     *  @return The name of the element for output.
245     */
246    public static final String determineElementName( final Element element )
247    {
248        final var retValue = switch( element.getKind() )
249            {
250                case PACKAGE -> element.toString().replace( '.', '/' ) + "/package-info.java";
251                case MODULE -> "module-info.java";
252                case ANNOTATION_TYPE, CLASS, ENUM, INTERFACE, RECORD -> element.toString().replace( '.', '/' ) + ".java";
253                case CONSTRUCTOR, ENUM_CONSTANT, FIELD, METHOD -> format( "%s::%s", determineElementName( element.getEnclosingElement() ), element );
254                default -> format( "Don't know yet how to get the output name for '%1$s' of kind '%2$s'", element, element.getKind().toString() );
255            };
256
257        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
258        return retValue;
259    }   //  determineElementName()
260
261    /**
262     *  Finds the end of a tag in the given text.
263     *
264     *  @param  text    The text.
265     *  @return The position for closing bracket for the tag, or -1 if there is
266     *      no closing bracket, or the text is not a tag.
267     */
268    private static final int findEnd( final String text )
269    {
270        var retValue = -1;
271        if( text.startsWith( TAG_LEADIN ) )
272        {
273            var level = 1;
274            retValue = 2;
275            while( (level > 0) && (retValue < text.length()) )
276            {
277                switch( text.charAt( retValue ) )
278                {
279                    case '}' -> { if( --level > 0 ) ++retValue; }
280                    case '{' -> { if( (retValue++ < text.length()) && (text.charAt( retValue ) == '@') ) ++level; }
281                    default -> ++retValue;
282                }
283            }
284            if( level > 0 ) retValue = -1;
285        }
286
287        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
288        return retValue;
289    }   //  findEnd()
290
291    /**
292     *  Returns the file object for the file with the given name that is
293     *  associated with the given type element. Use this to determine to
294     *  storage location for a documentation file for a class or alike.
295     *
296     *  @param  environment The doclet environment, providing the necessary
297     *      settings and helpers.
298     *  @param  typeElement The type element that determines the storage
299     *      location.
300     *  @param  fileName    The file name; it may contain a relative path.
301     *  @return The output file object.
302     *  @throws IOException A problem showed up when determining the output
303     *      file object.
304     */
305    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5" )
306    public static final FileObject getOutputFileObject( final DocletEnvironment environment, final TypeElement typeElement, final String fileName ) throws IOException
307    {
308        final var elementUtils = requireNonNullArgument( environment, "environment" ).getElementUtils();
309        final var fileManager = environment.getJavaFileManager();
310
311        final var packageName = elementUtils.getPackageOf( requireNonNullArgument( typeElement, "typeElement" ) ).getQualifiedName().toString();
312        final var module = elementUtils.getModuleOf( typeElement );
313        final var location = isNull( module ) ? DOCUMENTATION_OUTPUT : fileManager.getLocationForModule( DOCUMENTATION_OUTPUT, module.getQualifiedName().toString() );
314        final var retValue = fileManager.getFileForOutput( location, packageName, fileName, null );
315
316        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
317        return retValue;
318    }   //  getOutputFileObject()
319
320    /**
321     *  The taglets that are internally used to handle embedded tags needs to
322     *  be initialised with references to the
323     *  {@link DocletEnvironment}
324     *  and the
325     *  {@link Doclet}.
326     *
327     *  @param  docletEnvironment   The doclet environment.
328     *  @param  doclet  The doclet.
329     */
330    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5" )
331    public static final void initHelperTaglets( final DocletEnvironment docletEnvironment, final Doclet doclet )
332    {
333        synchronized( m_InlineTagletCollectionGuard )
334        {
335            if( isNull( m_InlineTagletCollection ) )
336            {
337                //---* Create the collection of inline taglets *---------------
338                m_InlineTagletCollection = List.of
339                    (
340                        new AnchorTaglet(),
341                        new org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.CodeTaglet(),
342                        new HRefTaglet(),
343                        new org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.IndexTaglet(),
344                        new org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.LiteralTaglet(),
345                        new UnderlineTaglet()
346                    );
347
348                //---* Initialise the taglets *--------------------------------
349                m_InlineTagletCollection.forEach( t -> t.init( docletEnvironment, doclet ) );
350            }
351        }
352    }   //  initHelperTaglets()
353
354    /**
355     *  Parses the given tags for a name and an email address.<br>
356     *  <br>The tag is prefixed with the tag text, and name and email address
357     *  are separated by a hyphen ("-").
358     *
359     *  @param  taglet  The originating taglet.
360     *  @param  tags    The tags.
361     *  @return The formatted output.
362     */
363    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5" )
364    public static final String parseNameAndEmail( final Taglet taglet, final Collection<? extends DocTree> tags )
365    {
366        final var prefix = format( "@%s", taglet.getName() );
367        final var prefixLen = prefix.length();
368        final var retValue = tags.stream()
369            .map( Object::toString )
370            .map( s -> s.substring( prefixLen ).trim() )
371            .map( s ->
372            {
373                final var pos = s.indexOf( " - " );
374                if( pos < 0 )
375                {
376                    if( s.endsWith( " -" ) ) return s.substring( 0, s.length() - 1 ).trim();
377                    return s.trim();
378                }
379
380                final var emailAddress = s.substring( pos + 3 ).trim();
381                if( emailAddress.isEmpty() ) return s.substring( 0, pos ).trim();
382
383                final var buffer = s.substring( 0, pos ).trim() +
384                    " (<a href=\"mailto:" +
385                    emailAddress +
386                    "\">" +
387                    emailAddress +
388                    "</a>)";
389                return buffer;
390            } )
391            .collect( joining( ", ") );
392
393        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
394        return retValue;
395    }   //  parseNameAndEmail()
396
397    /**
398     *  Processes inline tags in the given text.<br>
399     *  <br>This method will consider only the inline tags
400     *  <ul>
401     *  <li>{@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.AnchorTaglet @anchor}</li>
402     *  <li>{@code @code}</li>
403     *  <li>{@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.HRefTaglet @href}</li>
404     *  <li>{@code @index}</li>
405     *  <li>{@code @literal}</li>
406     *  <li>{@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.UnderlineTaglet @underline}</li>
407     *  </ul>
408     *
409     *  @param  text    The text to process.
410     *  @param  docTreeFactory  The factory for the doc tree instances.
411     *  @param  element The element where this tag lives.
412     *  @param  nameGenerator   A function that generates a name from a String.
413     *  @return The text after the tags are processed.
414     */
415    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5" )
416    public static final String processInlineTags( final CharSequence text, final DocTreeFactory docTreeFactory, final Element element, final Function<? super CharSequence, ? extends Name> nameGenerator )
417    {
418        final var retValue = new StringBuilder();
419        synchronized( m_InlineTagletCollectionGuard )
420        {
421            if( isNull( m_InlineTagletCollection ) ) throw new IllegalStateException( "Common.initHelperTaglets() was not called" );
422
423            if( isNotEmpty( text ) )
424            {
425                var currentText = text.toString();
426                var proceed = true;
427                int pos;
428                while( proceed )
429                {
430                    pos = currentText.indexOf( TAG_LEADIN );
431                    if( pos < 0 )
432                    {
433                        retValue.append( currentText );
434                        proceed = false;
435                    }
436                    else
437                    {
438                        retValue.append( currentText, 0, pos );
439                        currentText = currentText.substring( pos );
440                        pos = findEnd( currentText );
441                        if( pos < 0 )
442                        {
443                            retValue.append( currentText );
444                            proceed = false;
445                        }
446                        else
447                        {
448                            String prefix;
449                            DocTree docTree;
450                            for( final var taglet : m_InlineTagletCollection )
451                            {
452                                final var tagName = taglet.getName();
453                                prefix = format( "%s%s ", TAG_LEADIN, tagName );
454                                if( currentText.startsWith( prefix ) )
455                                {
456                                    final var textTree = docTreeFactory.newTextTree( currentText.substring( prefix.length(), pos ) );
457                                    switch( tagName )
458                                    {
459                                        case "code" -> docTree = docTreeFactory.newCodeTree( textTree );
460                                        case "index" ->
461                                        {
462                                            final var body = textTree.getBody();
463                                            final String term;
464                                            final String description;
465                                            if( body.startsWith( "\"" ) )
466                                            {
467                                                final var p = body.indexOf( "\" ", 1 );
468                                                if( p < 0 )
469                                                {
470                                                    term = body.trim();
471                                                    description = term;
472                                                }
473                                                else
474                                                {
475                                                    term = body.substring( 1, p );
476                                                    if( body.length() > p )
477                                                    {
478                                                        description = body.substring( p + 2 ).trim();
479                                                    }
480                                                    else
481                                                    {
482                                                        description = term.trim();
483                                                    }
484                                                }
485                                            }
486                                            else
487                                            {
488                                                final var p = body.indexOf( " " );
489                                                if( p < 0 )
490                                                {
491                                                    term = body.trim();
492                                                    description = term;
493                                                }
494                                                else
495                                                {
496                                                    term = body.substring( 0, p );
497                                                    description = body.substring( p + 1 ).trim();
498                                                }
499                                            }
500                                            docTree = docTreeFactory.newIndexTree( docTreeFactory.newTextTree( term ), singletonList( docTreeFactory.newTextTree( description ) ) );
501                                        }
502                                        case "literal" -> docTree = docTreeFactory.newLiteralTree( textTree );
503                                        default -> docTree = docTreeFactory.newUnknownInlineTagTree( nameGenerator.apply( tagName ), singletonList( textTree ) );
504                                    }
505                                    retValue.append( taglet.toString( singletonList( docTree ), element ) );
506                                }
507                            }
508
509                            if( currentText.length() > pos )
510                            {
511                                currentText = currentText.substring( pos + 1 );
512                            }
513                            else
514                            {
515                                proceed = false;
516                            }
517                        }
518                    }
519                }
520            }
521        }
522
523        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
524        return retValue.toString();
525    }   //  processInlineTags()
526}
527//  class Common
528
529/*
530 *  End of File
